{"id":1053423178,"lang":"typescript","lang_name":"TypeScript","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1695116218,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"71 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1053423178/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"45.9 MB","code":"function pivotIndex(nums: number[]): number {\n    const n = nums.length;\n    let leftsums = new Array(n+1), rightsums = new Array(n+1);\n    leftsums[0] = 0, rightsums[0] = 0;\n    for(let i=1; i < n+1; i++) {\n        leftsums[i] = (nums[i-1]+leftsums[i-1]);\n        rightsums[i] = (nums[n-i]+rightsums[i-1]);\n    }\n    for(let i=0; i <= n; i++) {\n        if(leftsums[i] == rightsums[n-(i+1)]) return i;\n    }\n    return -1;\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
